extendedInfo.description: Feeling tired? Stressed? Overwhelmed by work or school? Don't you just want to get away from it all? Well look no further! This free 6-in-1 application is designed specifically for all tastes and to help YOU completely relax , sleep or meditate. 6 different stages, each with unique SEAMLESSLY looping sounds and music, accompanied by a set of calming pictures. All you have to do, is sit back, relax and enjoy, as you drift away from your stressful life and set aside your daily troubles. Features:- 13 unique relaxing sounds and tracks- All sound and song loops are seamless. The user experience is very important to us and that is why we say - Goodbye Interruptions!!- Adjust different volumes to all of the sounds in an easy-to-use interface- Set the time before your app shuts down so that you don't need to worry about falling asleep and having your battery utterly destroyed.- Set whether to show pictures and UI or a black screen(also in order to save battery) NOTE! - do not lock your screen or the sound will stop - Instead use this option- 26 high-quality photos carefully chosen for the user's viewing pleasure- 6 different stages, 6 different moods. Combining the various sounds and pictures we've embodied a different mood and feeling to each of the 6 stages, whether you want to sleep listening to the calming piano music while staring at the night sky or you want to cheer yourself up by a daily visit to the pub , this app will surely provide something for everyone!Stage 1: Fire, Rain, JazzPour yourself a glass of whiskey and sit back in your armchair, it's time to get classy! A thunderstorm in the distance, a warm fireplace in front of you and a smooth piano and trumpet jazz track. What could be better?Stage2: Stream, birdsEnjoy the beauty of mother nature in its finest: the calming water sounds of the mountain creek and the beautiful song of the nightingales.Stage3: Sleep...Using Kevin MacLeod's track "At rest" and the beautiful pictures of the night sky this will have you sleeping in mere minutes.Stage4: Sunny Beach, SeagullsWhat is the best thing about summer? Going to the beach and lying in the sun, listening to the relaxing sound of the ocean waves and maybe the annoying yet strangely soothing cackle of the seagulls.Stage5: Celtic folk, fire, people talkingIf you like taverns, fire, irish/celtic style music (and drinking!) then this is the one for you!Stage6: MeditationClear your mind and find inner peace. The track "Senbazzuru" is reminiscent of the music in the Far East and combining that with the repetitively falling water drops you will realize that you need not worry. Everything will be alright...Sounds:rain sounds, fire sounds, river and water sounds, beach waves sounds, music courtesy of the very talented Kevin MacLeod(incompetech.com) and much MUCH more! Prepare to relax completely with the best sleep and relaxation app on the market.From us at EarthShake Studios: Relax and ENJOY! :)Creating an app takes time and money, In order to keep creating great (and free!) apps, we are using a new search service to monetize our apps. With this service we are able to create more great apps for you guys. This option bundles a few search points (icon, bookmark and homepage) for you to use. You can erase these easily and with no effect to our app. Thanks!Due to country restriction the full paid version will only be available on androidtapp.com

reviews.title: Screen lock
reviews.comment: Screen locking causes audio to stop. Shouldn\'t have to set screen to stay on for 30 min to use this. So, no sleeping to this, then.
reviews.author: sassy britches

reviews.title: Won\'t even open
reviews.comment: Force close immediately upon open. uninstalled right away
reviews.author: Dena Hansen

reviews.title: Ads included
reviews.comment: Contains Startapp which places ads in notification bar. Startapp has no opt out, so the app must be uninstalled to stop ads!
reviews.author: jas perth

reviews.title: Very good
reviews.comment: I really liked how the sounds were combined with the pictures :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Was Stopped by AVG
reviews.comment: AVG did not like this app
reviews.author: Andrew Turrell
